toys.name: Ferrari F40
toys.description: The legendary Italian supercar that dominated the 80s with its twin-turbo V8 engine and iconic design.

toys.name: Porsche 911
toys.description: The timeless German sports car that combines daily usability with track-ready performance.

toys.name: Lamborghini Countach
toys.description: The wedge-shaped Italian supercar that defined the 80s with its aggressive styling and powerful V12.

toys.name: Ford Mustang
toys.description: America's iconic muscle car that brings raw power and classic styling to the streets.

toys.name: Bugatti Veyron
toys.description: The engineering marvel that redefined speed limits with its quad-turbo W16 engine.

toys.name: McLaren F1
toys.description: The revolutionary British supercar that held the production car speed record for over a decade.

toys.name: Audi R8
toys.description: The German supercar that combines quattro all-wheel drive with stunning performance.

toys.name: Ducati Panigale V4
toys.description: The Italian superbike that combines cutting-edge technology with breathtaking performance.

toys.name: Kawasaki Ninja H2R
toys.description: The track-only hyperbike with a supercharged engine and unmatched speed.

toys.name: Harley-Davidson Fat Boy
toys.description: The iconic cruiser that defines the spirit of freedom and adventure.
